title: More LAMD Support
body: You can now choose whether to use LAMD for handling the downloads or not.  Also added feedback to LAMD support commands.

title: LAMD Support
body: The latest release now supports sending UserIDs and removing UserIDs from LAMD for monitoring.  Be sure to also upgrade to the latest version of LAMD for full support.

title: Automated Builds
body: The build/release process has been switched to using Travis-CI and Appveyor for automation.  Releases will be available within 15 minutes of new updates being committed to the GitHub repo.

title: New Downloader
body: LiveMe Pro Tools v1.50 now has the ability to download replays directly without needing to use jDownloader2 and even supports concurrent downloading.

title: New Filtering
body: Did you know starting in v1.20 you can now filter your Following and Fans list by country now?

title: Missing Replays
body: Even though it may say there's replays available, sometimes they are marked hidden and therefore are not visible.
